mapper.insert: insert into db_recruitment_information(post_name,post_annual_salary,post_type,post_education,post_profile,company_address, company_region,company_name,company_profile,company_mailbox, create_time, update_time) values (#{postName}, #{postAnnualSalary}, #{postType}, #{postEducation}, #{postProfile}, #{companyAddress}, #{companyRegion}, #{companyName}, #{companyProfile},#{companyMailbox}, now(), now());
mapper.update: update db_recruitment_information set post_name= #{postName}, post_annual_salary= #{postAnnualSalary}, post_type= #{postType}, post_education= #{postEducation}, post_profile= #{postProfile}, company_address= #{companyAddress}, company_region= #{companyRegion}, company_name= #{companyName}, company_profile= #{companyProfile}, company_mailbox= #{companyMailbox}, update_time= now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select dbri.id AS id, dbri.post_name AS postName, dbri.post_annual_salary as postAnnualSalary, dbri.post_type AS postType, dbri.post_education AS postEducation, dbri.post_profile as postProfile, dbri.company_address AS companyAddress, dbri.company_region AS companyRegion, dbri.company_name AS companyName, dbri.company_profile AS companyProfile, dbri.company_mailbox AS companyMailbox, dbri.create_time AS createTime, dbri.update_time AS updateTime, dbri.delete_status AS deleteStatus from db_recruitment_information dbri where dbri.delete_status = 0
and (dbri.post_type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchPostType}),'%'))
and (dbri.company_region LIKE concat(concat('%',#{searchCompanyRegion}),'%'))
order by dbri.update_time DESC limit #{page} , #{limit};
